Title: The wind-riding, wave-cleaving "Heping No. 28"
Designer: Wu Shaoyun (吴少云)Zhang Yuqing (章育青)Lu Zezhi (陆泽之)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The coastal bulk carrier "Peace 28" (和平28 - Heping 28) was constructed at the  Shanghai Jiangnan Shipyard (上海江南造船厂) in 1958 in just 70 days. This was presented as a triumph of the working class just after the campaign against the 'rightists'.
